players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."
You: "Be careful, Diana. Your accusation might be incorrect."
Charlie: "I don't think Bob is the mafioso, but I'm not sure about Diana. We should investigate her too."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, I'm sure of it."
